## California Wildfire and Forest Resilience Task Force meeting in Grass Valley CA

Becky, Pat and Rebecca attended the California Wildfire and Forest Resilience Task Force meeting in Grass Valley CA (September 27th-28th). Rebecca tabled and presented outreach material and talked with folks interested in forest resilience.
